message: Hi! I'm working from home most of the time in upper Haight, but I'm looking for good places to work outside of the house now. Any good suggestions?
Oakside Cafe http://www.yelp.com/biz/oakside-cafe-san-francisco is a great place to work. Really quiet, free wifi, always an open seat, and outlets.
Whoa, that's extraordinarily close to my house too. Good tip, thanks!
NextSpace are fantastic we use them and love the model, get to meet a lot of other entrepreneurs and freelancers there - http://nextspace.us/
